issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> This is already fixed by . If your AdGuard for iOS doesn't support advanced protection (iOS 14 or under), this is not fixable as there's no difference between the ad and the rest of items in CSS selector. If does support, please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update. Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process. @Sergey-Lyapin @jellizaveta Pls check in case.`detail.chiebukuro.yahoo.co.jp#?##lsc div[class^="ClapLv3SearchList_Chie-SearchList__Item__"]:-abp-has(> div > div[class*="__Information__"] > div[class*="__InformationIcon__"] > div[class*="__InformationText__"]:contains(広告))`

The device used is iOS15 and Safari extensions are enabled.
How do I check if Advanced Protection is enabled?

comment.body:
This is already fixed by `detail.chiebukuro.yahoo.co.jp#?##lsc div[class^="ClapLv3SearchList_Chie-SearchList__Item__"]:-abp-has(> div > div[class*="__Information__"] > div[class*="__InformationIcon__"] > div[class*="__InformationText__"]:contains(広告))`. If your AdGuard for iOS doesn't support advanced protection (iOS 14 or under), this is not fixable as there's no difference between the ad and the rest of items in CSS selector. If does support, please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update. Do not close AdGuard window ~60 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.
@Sergey-Lyapin @jellizaveta Pls check in case.

comment.body:
> @Ry-315 https://adguard.com/ja/blog/adguard-4-3-for-ios.html によれば
> 
> > ※「高度な保護機能」は、AdGuardプレミアム版でのみご利用いただけます。
> 
> とのことですので、
> 
> > because you are using the free version (highly likely)
> 
> が原因と思われます。

機能拡張の「AdGuard」を開くと一番上に、「基本レベル保護のみ」と表示されているので原因はそれだと思います。
「not planned」としてCloseしてください。
高度な保護機能が必要な広告は記憶上これが初めてです。

(English)
When you open the "AdGuard" extension, I think that is the cause, because at the top of the extension, it shows "Basic level protection only".
Please Close as "not planned".
This is the first ad in memory that requires advanced protection.
